spells.name: Frostwyrm's Fury
spells.secondaryEffects: Deals Frost damage

spells.name: Anti-Magic Zone
spells.secondaryEffects: Absorbs magic damage for party/raid members within 10 yards for 8 seconds (10 seconds with Assimilation talent)
spells.pvpModifications: Cooldown increased to 4 minutes in patch 11.2, reduced to 2:40 with Assimilation talent

spells.name: Death Grip
spells.secondaryEffects: Forces the target to move to Death Knight
spells.pvpModifications: 15 seconds in PvE, remains 25 seconds in PvP (patch 11.2), displacement DR category - 10 second reset timer

spells.name: Void Torrent
spells.secondaryEffects: Triggers Void Volley for 20 seconds after completion
spells.pvpModifications: Cooldown reduced from 45 to 30 seconds in patch 11.2

spells.name: Shadow Crash
spells.secondaryEffects: Now has 2 charges (was 1 charge with 20s cooldown)
spells.pvpModifications: 15-second cooldown with 2 charges in patch 11.2

spells.name: Summon Vilefiend
spells.secondaryEffects: Summons a Vilefiend for 15 seconds
spells.pvpModifications: Cooldown reduced from 30 to 25 seconds in patch 11.2

spells.name: Summon Demonic Tyrant
spells.secondaryEffects: Extends duration of all active demons and increases their damage
spells.pvpModifications: Standardized to 1-minute cooldown in patch 11.2 for consistent burst windows

spells.name: Berserker Roar
spells.secondaryEffects: Removes and grants immunity to Fear, Sap, and Incapacitate effects for 6 seconds. Also reduces the duration of the next crowd control effect within 15 seconds by 50% on group members within 40 yards.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.1, replaces Berserker Shout

spells.name: Death's Cold Embrace
spells.secondaryEffects: Grants Remorseless Winter and increases its damage by 1000% and its radius by 150%, but your movement speed is heavily reduced for its duration. Pillar of Frost's cooldown increased by 15 seconds.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.2, maximum duration capped at 5 seconds in PvP

spells.name: Illidan's Grasp
spells.secondaryEffects: You strangle the target with demonic magic, stunning them in place and dealing Shadow damage over 5 seconds while the target is grasped. Can move while channeling. Use Illidan's Grasp again to toss the target to a location within 20 yards. Replaces Fel Eruption.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.1, maximum duration capped at 5 seconds in PvP

spells.name: Ancient of Lore
spells.secondaryEffects: Shapeshift into an Ancient of Lore for 12 seconds, preventing all crowd control effects, reducing damage taken by 20%, and granting you access to Blossom Burst and Mass Blooming. Reduced movement speed and replaces Incarnation: Tree of Life.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.1

spells.name: Overpowered Barrier
spells.secondaryEffects: All barriers absorb 100% more damage and have an additional effect, but last 5 seconds.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.1

spells.name: Ring of Fire
spells.secondaryEffects: Disorients enemies who enter for 3 seconds and burns for 3% of their maximum health over its duration. Overrides Ring of Frost.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.1, maximum duration capped at 3 seconds in PvP

spells.name: Blessing of Spellwarding
spells.secondaryEffects: Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 10 seconds. Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 seconds. Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Protection.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.1

spells.name: Shining Revelation
spells.secondaryEffects: The light reveals all enemies in stealth or invisible to you while under the effects of Divine Shield. This effect lingers for 20 seconds after Divine Shield fades.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.1

spells.name: Thunderstruck
spells.secondaryEffects: Next Thunder Clap after Shield Slam, Revenge, or Execute roots all enemies for 6 seconds
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.2, maximum duration capped at 6 seconds in PvP

spells.name: Dragon Charge
spells.secondaryEffects: You can now move slightly left and right during its effect. Now available to all warrior specializations and overrides Heroic Leap.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent redesigned in 11.1

spells.name: Absolute Serenity
spells.secondaryEffects: Prevents ALL crowd control effects. Previously limited to certain types.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent updated in 11.1 to prevent all CC

spells.name: Nullifying Shroud
spells.secondaryEffects: Verdant Embrace prevents the next full loss of control effect for 4 seconds
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.2

spells.name: Niuzao's Essence
spells.secondaryEffects: Clears snares after using defensive abilities
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.2

spells.name: Lay in Wait
spells.secondaryEffects: Sigil of Misery gains 2 charges and can lay in wait for 90 seconds
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.2

spells.name: Price of Progress
spells.secondaryEffects: Immunity to slows below 100% speed and knockbacks
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.2

spells.name: Preemptive Maneuver
spells.secondaryEffects: Feint decreases your damage taken by an additional 40% while stunned and its energy cost is reduced by 30%.
spells.pvpModifications: PvP talent added in 11.1
